properties.Observation: The existing canal has been concreted 1000m length(height=0.45m, width=0.6m, thickness 0.125m). The rest of the canal is an earthen canal.  165 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal. At present farmers used canal. The canal area is very dangerous, and this section might be landslide again.
